stages.name: Digits (1–10)
stages.description: Learn the basic building blocks: 일, 이, 삼... 십

stages.name: Teens (11–20)
stages.description: Combine ten with digits: 십일, 십이... 이십

stages.name: Decades
stages.description: Round numbers: 십, 이십, 삼십... 백

stages.name: Three digits (101–999)
stages.description: Any number up to a thousand
